FuncDef:
The aging-time command configures the aging time for entries in the packet loss visualization flow table.
The undo aging-time command cancels the aging time configuration for entries in the packet loss visualization flow table. The aging-time command configures the aging time for entries in the packet loss visualization flow table. The undo aging-time command cancels the aging time configuration for entries in the packet loss visualization flow table. By default, the aging time for entries in the packet loss visualization flow table is 30 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the aging time for entries in the packet loss visualization flow table. The value 0 indicates that the entries in the flow table are not aged out.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 3600, in seconds. The default value is 30.
